message: Hello Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a competitive price. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm trying to be mindful of my budget.

I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product, and I think that's a fair price considering the value it brings. Can you consider that?

I understand you're still trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can offer it to you for $110. That's the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a great value for what you'll get.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product, which is the price I've been eyeing from the start. Can you meet me at this price?

I've been willing to make concessions, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $115, which is still a great deal, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. It's a one-time offer, so I'd appreciate it if you could consider it.
